OrgName: Master Data Center, Inc., a subsidiary of Thomson Reuters (TRI) Inc.
activities: Collection and processing of personal information from the use of Thomson IP Manager, including use through associated websites and/or Software as a Service (“SaaS”) versions of the product.
contacttitle1: Vice President and Senior Privacy Officer
corpofftitle1: Global Head of Product & Content, IP&S
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Thomson IP Manager customers (entities) may upload personal information about others, such as patent and trademark holders, inventors, and patent and trademark applicants. TR may collect voluntarily-supplied personal information, for example, name, address, phone number, email address and/or payment card information.
